title: BRIEF-4Sight Holdings Says Johandre Engelbrecht Appointed As New Audit Partner, Replacing T.J. De Kock
text:
BRIEF-4Sight Holdings Says Johandre Engelbrecht Appointed As New Audit Partner, Replacing T.J. De Kock

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 30, 2019 11:50)

© Reuters. BRIEF-4Sight Holdings Says Johandre Engelbrecht Appointed As New Audit Partner, Replacing T.J. De Kock Sept 30 (Reuters) - 4Sight Holdings Ltd : * JSE: 4SI - CHANGE IN DESIGNATED AUDIT PARTNER * 4SIGHT HOLDINGS LTD - JOHANDRE ENGELBRECHT HAS BEEN APPOINTED AS NEW AUDIT PARTNER REPLACING T.J. DE KOCK * 4SIGHT HOLDINGS LTD - ENGLEBRECHT APPOINTMENTS AS DESIGNATED AUDIT PARTNER WILL BE CONFIRMED AT NEXT ANNUAL GENERAL MEETING.

BRIEF-4Sight Holdings Says Johandre Engelbrecht Appointed As New Audit Partner, Replacing T.J. De Kock
